div.p: The following diagram provides a high level description of the interactions between external local systems (here described as local system A and B, in most cases cohincident) and the PCSP platform.
Any system of system of systems providing the Treatment Summary to the PCSP Platform

li.p:
receiving the
Treatment Summary
from the Local System A
processing the Treatment Summary to generate the the draft SCP
providing the SurPass with the SCP (draft or final) to Local System B

div.p: Any system of system of systems receiving the SurPass with the SCP (draft or final) from the PCSP Platform
It may be the same system realizing the Local System A

Logical model of the
Treatment Summary
div.h4: SurPass with the SCP (draft or final)
div.p: Logical model of the SurPass with the SCP (draft or final)
